## Slide 1: Title Slide

Welcome to the Shiny App Pitch Presentation.

## Slide 2: Introduction

This presentation introduces a simple prediction app created using Shiny.

## Slide 3: Application Overview

The app takes a numeric input and predicts a value by doubling it.

## Slide 4: Code Example

```{r}
# Example of the prediction algorithm
num <- 5
predicted_value <- num * 2
predicted_value

```
